import React, { Component } from 'react'; import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; import "../css/styles.css"; import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; import Getdata from "./getdata"; // import "../css/dataTables.css"; import axios from "axios"; import DataTable from "react-data-table-component"; import { BrowserRouter as Router, Switch, Route, Link } from "react-router-dom"; class Layout_right extends Component { // history = useHistory(); data=[]; constructor(props) { super(props); this.state={ data:[], } } componentWillMount() { Getdata.get(); } componentDidMount() { axios({ method: 'GET', data: { text: "jjjj" }, url: 'http://localhost/react-project/product.php', //timeout: 4000, // 4 seconds timeout }) .then(response => { this.data=response.data; this.setState({ data: response.data }); // console.log(response.data); }) .catch(error => console.error('timeout exceeded')); } render() { const columns = [ { name: "Name", selector: "name", sortable: true }, { name: "Price", selector: "price", sortable: true }, { name: "Sell price", selector: "sell_price", sortable: true, right: true }, { name: "Mass", selector: "mass", sortable: true, right: true }, { name: "Quantity", selector: "quantity", sortable: true, right: true }, { name: "Title", selector: "title", sortable: true, right: true }, { name: "Category", selector: "industry", sortable: true, right: true }, { name: "ED", selector: "ED", sortable: true, right: true }, { name: "MFG", selector: "MFG", sortable: true, right: true }, { name: "Company", selector: "company", sortable: true, right: true }, { name: "Image", selector: "image", sortable: true, right: true } ]; return (
